testcase.name: Navigate to Website Successfully

testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to home page to test now...............................passed When user clicks on Text Input after page landing page loads................passed Then user is on Text Input page.............................................passed

testcase.name: Log into the Sample App Successfully
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on Sample App field page..................................passed And user enters "Trishalin" for username and "pwd" for password.............passed When user clicks login button...............................................passed Then user is logged into Sample App.........................................passed

testcase.classname: As a user I should be able to enter text in the text field for the button name and save my changes.
